description: Pizza Hut, LLC [ 3 ] is an American multinational pizza restaurant chain and international franchise founded in 1958 in Wichita, Kansas , by brothers Dan and Frank Carney . The chain, headquartered in Plano, Texas , operates 19,866 restaurants worldwide as of 2023. [ 4 ]
